content: Previously the Chinese Rust community started an effort to standardize rust terminologies at https://github.com/rust-lang-cn/english-chinese-glossary-of-rust . (Some of the items still needs to be audited in the list though) I wonder if we can convert this into a separate translation project on pontoon, and expand it to all languages.

@Charles Lew I have been thinking of adding a common terms/jargon page to the forge. Obviously mdbook isn't translatable atm but I would be interested in having that page regardless if you'd be interested in that.

@XAMPPRocky I'm also interested. However if it's the in the forge, i'd imagine that will include many terms and jargons from Rust project workflow and daily discussions, which might be quite different from language terminology, and should be a different thing.

I'm interested in that too. As a non-English-native-speaker I'd imagine that will significantly reduce the situations i have to look up a dictionary to understand the abbreviations here and on github :)
Ah I see you what mean now.
